1: -module(pixelwar_serv_SUITE).
    2: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
    3: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    4: -include_lib("apps/pixelwar/src/matrix.hrl").
    5: -compile(export_all).
    6: -define(SERVER_NAME, "matrix").
    7: 
    8: all() ->
    9:     [get_state_test_case, place_out_of_bounds_test_case].
   10: 
   11: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   12:     application:load(pixelwar),
   13: 
   14:     {ok, Apps} = application:ensure_all_started([pixelwar]),
   15: 
   16:     pixelwar_sup:add_matrix(?SERVER_NAME),
   17: 
   18:     [{apps, Apps} | Config].
   19: 
   20: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   21:     [application:stop(App) || App <- lists:reverse(?config(apps, Config))],
   22:     Config.
   23: 
   24: get_state_test_case() ->
   25:     [
   26:         {doc, "Tries to get the current matrix as binary"},
   27:         {timetrap, timer:seconds(5)}
   28:     ].
   29: 
   30: get_state_test_case(_Config) ->
   31:     pixelwar_matrix_serv:set_element(?SERVER_NAME, {42, 42, 12}),
   32:     pixelwar_matrix_serv:set_element(?SERVER_NAME, {42, 42, 42}),
   33:     pixelwar_matrix_serv:set_element(?SERVER_NAME, {11, 12, 13}),
   34: 
   35:     MatrixAsBin = pixelwar_matrix_serv:get_state(?SERVER_NAME),
   36:     ?assertEqual(
   37:         MatrixAsBin,
   38:         <<11:16/little, 12:16/little, 13:16/little, 42:16/little, 42:16/little, 42:16/little>>
   39:     ).
   40: 
   41: place_out_of_bounds_test_case(_) ->
   42:     Inbound = ?DEFAULT_SIZE - 2,
   43:     Outbound = ?DEFAULT_SIZE + 2,
   44: 
   45:     % In bounds
   46:     pixelwar_matrix_serv:set_element(?SERVER_NAME, {Inbound, Inbound, 13}),
   47:     % Out of bounds
   48:     pixelwar_matrix_serv:set_element(?SERVER_NAME, {Outbound + 2, Outbound + 2, 13}),
   49: 
   50:     MatrixAsBin = pixelwar_matrix_serv:get_state(?SERVER_NAME),
   51: 
   52:     ?assertEqual(MatrixAsBin, <<Inbound:16/little, Inbound:16/little, 13:16/little>>).
